attributes.action: Make the EU contribution go to the issues that swung the vote in our Referendum.
attributes.additional_details:
Why put a vote to the people if the reasons behind that vote will not be implemented.

Now is the best time for the government to prove to the people that their vote counts!
attributes.background: After the recent referendum that sent a message not only to the EU but our own government, it is the obligation of this government to make decisive plans on how the £350 million of contributions to the EU is now going to be spent. i.e. NHS, Border Control, Social Housing, Sustainable Energy, etc
